5. Data storage
It's not clear whether you will use the digital vault for private data, or just OneDrive. Have a look here what is the best option for your data: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en OneDrive should be OK if you use multifactor authentication.
And keeping 3 extra backup copies seems a bit much.
